content: The app is really slow and filled with bugs. The saddest part is that it's so easy to get points, but when your reach sufficient points and try to redeem it, it won't let you. Oh, it will let you and show you that you have redeemed the points. But it surely won't give you the reward. Usually these guys responds really fast for any query, but when it comes to rewards they haven't responded even after a couple fo days.

Their weekly spin game is shown to be a spin the wheel type of game where the chance of getting each prize should correlate to the piece of the pie it's shown on the game. However it is completely rigged and I have only gotten the worst and same prize over and over again. This is false advertising and is an easy fix. They also don't give out the correct number of points when you spend the time doing their surveys.

This app is a great in theory. However points are rarely given out, I've been using it for years and have gotten points through my linked card only a handful of times. The only way to get points is to play the games they have in app or try your luck at some of the survey's they offer. I really wish this app was more reliable and consistent with points.

This app takes too much effort to make it work. I was using the app for 3 days in total and it unlinked my bank account twice in 3 days, making me link it over again. Problem #2 is that I always shop using my credit card to get points. I tried to connect my credit card along with my bank account and there was no possible way to do this. I contacted support and was told that it wasn't possible because my well known bank wouldn't allow it which makes this app unusable for me to shop with.

The app has finally streamlined the rewards process, so much less reaching out to customer support. However, the app has become super laggy. It checks for updates every time I log in, there is a long delay between pressing a button and the app responding. The app is a nightmare for quickly checking new offers. Really bad experience.

Takes about 5 minutes to boot, tapping any button takes about 20 seconds to respond then if you're lucky, it takes 30 seconds to load your selection, most often it won't load at all. Can't rate the service offered, the app was impossible to use. Maybe its device requirement issue, but I have similar apps that work fine.

My biggest complain with this app is the survey feature is totally broken. Countless times I've completed the surveys fully, spent upward to 25 mins to complete, and when they're done, I only received 17 points as if I didn't qualify... total scam and customer service was useless in resolving this issue. I stopped doing the surveys. Also, the card tends to unlink a lot and the app it's self is extremely unresponsive at times. Otherwise, it's somewhat decent. It used to be much better however.

This app would be really great if they would keep my accounts linked. I have lost out on thousands of points over the past few months because I can't link my accounts and have them stay linked. Even when I do relink, the system doesn't recognize them and still says they need to be linked. When I contacted customer service, they just blamed CIBC. It's really too bad because I like the app and it is an easy and fun way to earn.

been using this for years and every so often it unlinks my card/bank accounts. always so much frustration when trying to contact support about it and their answer is always along the lines of "issues usually resolve in a few days. just keep trying to relink" when it's been more than 2 weeks already. it's especially frustrating now that they've added perks for simply having a linked card. the app is also still so clunky after years of being on the market.

Painfully slow, essentially useless. Kept unlinking my accounts, so I was missing out on points, then finally decided it's "incompatible" with my bank. Customer service isn't great; took forever to answer my emails, suggested removing bank security procedures to link to the app. Erm, no. Not worth the effort.

great app! in less than a month I've gotten enough points for 2 $25 gift cards. only a small/medium portion of those points came from purchases. the surveys can be a bit finicky, but more recently they've worked much better. excited to use my drop points to buy crypto when I have enough again! the daily / reoccuring in-app games are addictive.

Great app, lots of opportunities to earn rewards/gift cards BUT had to take a star off because of how buggy and laggy the app is... And it's been like this for at least a year now. App takes forever to open and when it finally does I can't press on anything or it just lags for a couple of minutes which gets really frustrating.

I did enjoy this app but I started taking surveys and even though I completed 100% of the survey they aren't giving the correct amount of points as a reward. I know they end early and you get half points but almost everytime I'm completed a full survey they aren't giving the proper rewards for it ..something is messaged up with their system

I love my Drop app! I play basketball daily and it my favorite game. Points are easily applied to Amazon or cypto (now that option is there - love it). If you ever need to contact service or help, they answer promptly and always help you. This is my favourite 'cash back' app.
The app is great reward wise. But it so slow to load and sometimes crashes. If you don't have patience, don't bother cause you will smash your phone into 1000 pieces.

App will unlink your card when you make online purchases so it doesn't have to give you points... doesn't acknowledge half of your valid offers when you purchase.. customer service is automated so it is no help at all

Doesn't work. Takes forever to load. Unlinked my cards and now it's impossible to relink or even link a new card. As soon as I click on my bank, the app crashes. Buttons show up with no visible text so they're unusable. This app needs a LOT of work.

!!!! PLEASE IMMEDIATELY DELETE ANY AND ALL INFORMATION COLLECTED OR OBTAINED FROM ME OR MY DEVICE FROM YOUR SERVERS AND/OR SHARED WITH ANY OFFILIATES !!!! After downloading the first new app I've put on my phone in a couple months, I saw this in my app folder and have no recollection downloading it or anything like it. Unless somehow I unknowingly accidentally "fat finger" downloaded this app, it should not be on my device! I am unintalling now and reporting the incident.
replyContent: Hi there, please reach out to us at support@joindrop.com, and we'll be happy to look into this for you!

content: The correct points aren't awarded for surveys. Cards unlink from time to time. Alot of lagging these days. Surveys don't load well either. Lots of bugs all of a sudden! Please fix!!

Love the rewards system, that works fabulously. Do find the app quite laggy to use and have had issues contacting CS about points problems, found them unresponsive and contact information was either lacking or wrong.

This app is very questionable. They don't award points properly, meaning if the offer is boosted you will not get your points. The customer service is blah. Weeks without getting my points and still no help from customer service.
The app is extremely slow and buggy. The simple action of linking a card fails very often, it can take several attempts before you successfully link your card.

I have enjoy playing the games and this app is legit.What I don't like is the in brain surveys that make you answer questions to the very end over 20 mins or to say you are not qualified, without giving a single point for your time.zother than this I like the app.

Been about 1.5 months since my CIBC card has been linked. It keeps saying they're working on it but this long? I've missed on at least 2000 points if not more. And my other card isn't even an option within the system which is annoying.

I love the drop app. Free gift cards in canada. I have been a member for around 2 years and have earned around $180 in gift cards for amazon tim hortons sephora and best buy. I love this app. And it is safe to link your bank card too.
I've gotten back over $400 and I'm loving how easy it is. Sometimes slow to load, but totally worth the wait for the amount of money I've earned back.
This is a good app, to make extra cash. it really pays. I myself claimed two 25 dollars cards, extremely happy. Good App.
The app is so laggy and unresponsive. Selecting anything in the user interface takes at least 10 seconds for anything to happen, if at all.
The app is slow, has some bugs with points not always getting counted but it works!w I've gotten my gift card.
Tried the app again. No matter how often I relink my card it unlinks within the day. Just more hassle then it's worth.
replyContent: Hey Jeffrey, so sorry to hear about this! We'd love it if you'd take a moment to submit a missing points support ticket by going to your profile (top left), scrolling down to "get help," and proceeding through there. Be sure to reference this review to help our CS team get the full picture! Thanks, and looking forward to helping you out! :)

content: I love your app but you need to fix ad.gem soon because I can't Play any game almost...
Most shopping offers are a little too,um, middle class?? for me. I'm not going to be needing a mortgage or shopping for diamonds anytime soon. But the other aspects are pretty decent.
Rewards have improved over time, and daily games are a nice added bonus!
This app is so easy to get points from, I earn about $25 in 2 weeks of just doing surveys and playing games...I love it
Have pending points from over a year ago, tried to contact customer service few times - no response at all.
After writing a review, they sent me my giftcard after 6 days. Took twice as long as expected. Just wish their customer support responded back!
replyContent: Hi there, so sorry for the delay! We're currently working through an issue regarding these redemptions, but your reward should be available to you within 48 hours. We sincerely appreciate your patience.

content: Been trying to connect my bank accounts to your app for a while and still getting nothing but errors.

Do not give this app your card. Plaid is not secure as it should be. Luckily my bank blocked it but there was an attempted sign in to my account via mobile banking at 3am.... reporting this comany to the Better Business Bureau. Extremely fraudulent. Be very careful and uninstall immediately, change your banking info.

Not sure why there are so many bad reviews, I love this app! I find it more rewarding than ampli or checkout 51. Every week I complete the flash offer because with options like Amazon, McDonald's, or Starbucks I've always used it! I like this app over others because I don't buy things I normally wouldn't buy just to get points. I normally shop at Walmart, SportChek, indigo, etc and if you buy when they have point deals your points can add up quickly! The games and surveys also add up slowly!

Has gotten so much worse. Often doesn't give rewards for you shopping or completing surveys. Any bonuses that you are entitled to from your drop spin or from boosted deals don't actually get applied. Lies about the time required to complete surveys (I'm not about to spend 25 minutes for $1). Customer service is nonexistent but I'm guessing they will be all over this review, so maybe they can help resolve my issues and give me some of the $15+ I worked and shopped for on this app.

Love that it is a free app. The offers are getting better and better all the time. So i am able to redeem on a regular basis. I always have to send a query into pts that i should have earned through an offer i emailed to myself. Of course there is always a reason why they didnt go through and they will be added. Games that i am interested in always have a message "this offer is no longer available"
replyContent: Hey Ange, thanks so much for your review! If there is any way we could make it a 5-star experience we would love to hear about it at support@joindrop.com. Be sure to reference your Play Store review so we can keep track of your case! :)

content: I've been using the app awhile and in the beginning was skeptical, especially with the type of info they asked for... But so far nothing shady has happened. Also once in a while there is a bug and I brought it up with the support team (and true, some aspects of this could be streamlined a little) but the help I've gotten so far has always been great! So not at all regretting downloading this app

THEY ABSOLUTELY RUINED THIS APP WITH THE NEW "PREMIUM OFFERS" SECTION!!!!! They shamelessly downgraded the card-linked offers, now all the offers are temporary. And WORST OF ALL, the Amazon one is demoted to a "limited-time" offer on a first-come-first-serve basis. By the time I get the notification, the Amazon offer has already been reaped empty! This is beyond ridiculously stupid. I hope this is the outcome you wanted to achieve, because youve just lost a customer. Id rate 0 stars if I could.
Such a great app. Earn points to use towards real gift cards. Love to cash in on gift cards. I save up throughout the year and use my points towards Christmas presents.

The app wont open on my phone anymore. It is stuck on the "updating your app" and "checking for updates" for several minutes. Tried updating on Play Store and it still will not open properly. Can you pleade fix you app from this weird glitch? And change it so that this ridiculous update upon opening the app goes away altogether...

I really like the app and find the surveys/games/shopping rewards to be pretty good compared to other apps, but it is INCREDIBLY SLOW. If you guys could fix the speed lots of people would want to use this

They refuse to honour points when there is an error on their end and you followed instructions properly. Says "cash back" but you actually get gift/e-gift cards or certificates which isnt actually cash back. It requires a lot of time and effort to get enough points for good stuff plus the app is so SLOW it feels like its hacked. They refuse to honour some bank cards even though it is a Mastercard card issued by that bank. And FINALLY, Customer service takes almost a week to get back to you!

App was way better in the beginning (years ago), now almost every offer requires you to follow their link. Ampli is a far better option. My connected card hasn't earned me points in literal years, and I have shopped many of the in-store offers. Their customer service chat is automated and you can only start a ticket for 1 specific transaction at a time. No email address to inquire about a broader points issue? 👎🏽

When you shop at certain store you are suppose to get point. That work for a while. Now I only get points for games and surveys. Even when I shop at stores on the list I still don't get points. I have shopped at Safeway at least once a week and I have not got any point since the middle of September. Unfortunately the stores that are on the app are not close to me. In the last 3 months I have not got any points from McDonalds
replyContent: Hey Sheila! We’re excited to introduce Flash Deals, the takeover of Power Offers, designed to feature brands we know you’re going to love. Similar to Power Offers, you’ll shop with a linked card. For more info, please submit an in-app support ticket (profile at the top left of the app, then "get help") and reference your review. Thank you!

content: Right now, I have to give this a low rating. All I can do is a few surveys or play games, most of which I either already have played in the past, which aren't applicable for points, or have zero interest for me. I have had the app.for a week now and I still can't link my cards. I keep getting a no communication message. I have contacted support and, understandably, they can't connect my card for me. But I was basically told to just keep trying. It's more trouble than it's worth right now.

Save yourself the trouble and do not download it. Might have been a decent app in the past but it just jeeps getting worse. Take forever to load stuff but the worst thing is thier support team. They totally ignore straight out, accuse you of lying and do not even attempt to solve your issues.
I'm confused by the 1 star reviews, I have been using this app for years now and it's amazing. It actually pays out, I have redeemed for multiple sephora gift cards as well as others.
The idea of this app is okay. And seems to work. But the app is painfully slow. Click on a button.... Wait.... Wait..... Wait.... 30 seconds later it responds. So frustrating!!
After the latest update, the app simply says "Checking for updates" when loading and then crashes. Android 10 on OnePlus 5T.
My experience has been great until recently. I've tried multiple times to reach out to drop support team and have yet to hear back from anyone. I would have given 5 stars if not for that
I wish I could give less than a star... doesn't even open just crashes. Messaged developer more than once and nothing...
Pretty good. A lots of deals to explore. The app is slow to respond sometime though. Generally good.

I got this app based on youtube influencer who is a no nonsense, tell it like it is person "Dr Dray" whom I trust implicitly, however I have not been so frustrated and disappointed about an app if ever! I signed up & tried to link my 3 cards and was successful on only 1. With regards to the 2 I kept getting an "error" msg that my user name & p/word was incorrect. I repeatedly tried to link thinking that I made an error with a digit but all #'s was correct. I'm so fed up and will uninstall soon
It won't let me link my card but everything else works great, even with the card issues I am having I still highly recommend trying this for yourself....it's well worth your time.
An awesome app that gets me rewards just by doing my everyday purchases. The points from playing games I enjoy is a nice bonus
Best app to earn extra rewards on your everyday purchases. Above that you can earn by playing games and everyday. It's must have app.
App not well optimized. Not very responsive, sometimes do not respond at all.
Slow and steady. And you get rewards when you are done. I have enjoyed a few gift cards so far

Terrible experience with this app! I dubmitted s ticket for support as my email could not be verified and got no response for days! Got tired of waiting so deleted the app! Awful survice thats for sure. I have to say that i have edited my email on your app the day i couldn't get verified. Still it would not verify and you guys never responded.
replyContent: Hi there! We've attempted to reach out, but it appears a typo was made when an email was added during account creation, and so our responses are not coming through. Please check for the spelling of your email address, and hopefully we can turn this around for you!

content: Drop has not been able to connect to my bank for months now. Used to connect no problem and recieved lots of 'points' at two stores. Now those points are not available and I do not shop online much or from any of the retailers they offer now. Just redeemed most of my points for gift cards because I do not see a fix coming anytime soon.

I really liked this app at first as it was easy to accumulate points but then my credit card kept unlinking and unlinking and it took FOREVER for them to fix anything. The customer service is horrible. Takes ages for anyone to respond and if they do, they don't really do anything to help fix the issue. So I might have lost tons and tons of points while my card was unlinked. Now ... I have enough points to redeem something and I keep getting errors and it won't redeem!!!! I've been trying for 2 weeks!! I have sent a "ticket" about it and still haven't had any reply from customer service. I'm getting so annoyed. I want to use my damn points!

I love this app. It's great for collecting points! However, I've been experiencing an issue with the app glitching on the last step and not returning me to the Drop "home page", so I have to exit the app. Then the points dont show up. Then I have to email the company to get them to manually load the points (after taking screenshots and videos of the issue for proof.) It's getting annoying, and I think the people at drop are sick of me emailing them for my points. Please fix this issue ASAP!!
replyContent: Thanks so much for reaching out Katrina, We’re working hard to make this the best app it can be, and we couldn’t do it without the feedback from members like you. We would love to hear more at support@joindrop.com if you have time to go into more details!

content: I was so in love with this app, had recommended to many people. But it seems they got greedy, instead of improving for the betterment of everyone. It just feel like the carrot is always dangling in front of your face and then its gets pulled away anytime you get close. And i sense from most of the reviews that this is a common feeling felt by most users. Hopefully they smarten up soon before they really lose their popularity....(fyi Drop, your ratings are going down in case you haven't noticed).
replyContent: Hey there, we’re so sorry you encountered an issue with this offer. We are actively working with our partners to determine which members are owed points and we will get back to all affected members with an open ticket shortly. If you don’t already have a ticket, please consider submitting one to support@joindrop.com. Thanks!

content: I think this app is not worth it and it has the worst custimer support i have ever experienced. Most of the time, the rewards dont appear on your account and when you contact customer service, they take almost a week to respond. When customer service does respond, they usually come up with many new things you need to meet in order to earn your reward and ultimately dont give you yiur reward at all. The worst customer service I've ever experienced. Don't download this app.
replyContent: Hey Daniel, this doesn't sound right! Could you please submit a support ticket to support@earnwithdrop.com entitled "Google Play Store help"? We'd be happy to look into your missing points for you and get you back on track to earn lots more! :)

content: Was a good app until they started messing around with it too much. I have been saving my points for probably nearly a year or more now and every time I get close to getting enough to cash out they change their "cash out rules" and make it so that I have to keep going. Honestly it almost feel like it's on purpose, it has happened so many times now that I have basically given up on the app. Will use for another couple weeks to see if the under 30$ options come back then deleting
replyContent:
Hey there, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. We know it can be really frustrating when things change in the app. For a little more context on this we made an FAQ series that you can check out here: https://support.joindrop.com/hc/en-us/categories/202567547-FAQ
Hope you have a great day!

content: Most of the time this app works as it should. Had no complaints before. Lately Ive been having difficulty receiving points on new offers. Been in contact with customer service. They are prompt at first and quite friendly, but trail off without resolving my issue. I hope it's a backlog issue. Currently it's been 1 month with no response to my original email or follow up. Besides that everything else works as suggested.

It used to work perfectly fine for me, but it keeps unlinking my cards and giving me error when I try to relink it. So I haven't been able to collect points since July 2018. Also, I have selected the option to not receive push notifications for anything, but the app sends at least 5 notifications daily, which is really annoying. I would like to delete my account in the app. Thanks

My experience with Drop has been extremely rewarding. It is very user friendly with simple easy to read instructions to shop, and earn points. I recently had an issue with redeeming a gift card, to which the customer service agent was able to respond quickly with updates on my issue and provided me with the the next steps. Within 2 hours, I received my gift card. Would definitely recommend new users to Drop.
replyContent: Hey there Jody! We're so happy to hear that you've had a seamless experience so far. Happy earning :)

content: Horrible app that has gone downhill over the last several years. I acumulated 17k points and now they have taken out all the 5$-20$ offers without warning. It will take years for you to claim something and they constantly miss points. I've had to reach out several times to request points be added. You also have to make purchases through the app now to have the privilege of spending your points. You can see from the other reviews that everyone is feeling the same way, avoid this app.
replyContent: Hey Elston, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. We are working hard on new features that will provide you with more opportunities to earn points and customize your Drop experience. If you have any other questions please don’t hesitate to let us know at support@joindrop.com. Thanks for being a Drop member :)

content: Use to be a great app. I signed up for drop super early on, I loved it and took a chance when everyone thought it was sketchy to attach your credit cards. When you signed up you picked 5 stores that you would always get points for shopping at. They made a big deal about picking wisely because you can never change them. Well then they decided to change them by taking them away. And there was no communication sent out telling you that. I cashed out my points and left, not worth it now.

I followed the directions of an offer perfectly, but was not given the $12.50 in points which was promised. I spent $30 expecting to receive the points. I requested help after the allotted time, customer service said they can't give the points. So don't spend money on offers, since it is a risk that you will not receive the points. So far I haven't had issues on linked offers.

This is a great app to collect points with. And thats about it, because every time you go to redeem the points, the system changes or the tiers disappear. My original goal was a $10 starbucks card. Then $25 amazon. Both those options have disappeared from the redemption menu. But theres still the $50 starbucks card redeemable? Its a great idea, but stop changing the system so people can actually reach their goals.
replyContent: Hey Sarah, thanks for your feedback. Our offers and rewards change from time to time, and we have rolled out a lot of new ways to earn more points: contests, arcade games, offers over 25,000 points, deals, referral bonuses, and more. Please reach out to us at support@joindrop.com (and be sure to reference your review) for tips on earning with Drop!

content: beware of offers, they do not give you all the points for boosted offers. i've raised four tickets and are aware that i did not get all the points i should have but either stop following up or close my ticket immediately. app is slow and prone to crashes or not loading anything at all. UPDATE: problem was resolved, but it took a couple months. probably will not trust boosted offers, but will continue to use the app.

Two years later, still can't change the base offers. Half the point accumation rates don't make sense—sometimes it's 4 points per dollar and sometimes it's 40. Also, it seems like over half the offers are only for online purchases, rendering the app useless for those of us who want to, you know, try on something for size
replyContent: Hey Dion, we've heard this kind of feedback from our users, so we've made it possible to change your Power Offers once you've referred a friend to Drop! :) If you ever have any questions with regards to point rates, we'd be happy to explain them or let you know how many points per dollar your offers are worth!

content: I have still NOT yet even ONCE been able to even sign in. SO CLEARLY, I'VE SAVED NO MONEY. I have tried on an android, IOS, and windows. I've tried to contact customer service without any solutions. Not impressed at all. The only thing it would say to anything I tried was "AN ERROR HAS OCCURRED". Terrible experience. I had a lot of shopping to do as well. I was looking forward to trying it. Instead I wasted a bunch of my time for something that never worked once.

It has worked fine up to some point although there was an ongoing card linking issue which hasn't been fixed for months. I used it for it being still usable but since about a week ago the app is completely not working. I tried reinstalling on three different devices to make sure it's not an account or a phone issue, but after signing in the app wouldn't load from a blank white page. I really liked the concept of this app but due to the poor build quality I am deleting this app.
replyContent: Hey there, sorry to hear that! There have been recent changes to banks we are able to support due to some infrastructure updates. We'll ensure that going forward we are more careful with what financial institutions are displayed.

content: takes a full minute to open and is very slow to respond when everything else on my phone opens fine, which is really baffling. the UI is also extremely unintuitive - I really hate the nested menus that scroll both horizontally and vertically and need to be expanded. the variety of rewards has improved and the program is good as a whole, but I I just wish the app made sense. a desktop or even a web client would also help greatly, especially given the new range of online shopping offers.

great app, points really add up and value is well worth it compared to ebates. the support team is really prompt and efficient. my only issue would be that i wish there was a search function as it can take time to look for a specific shop (that you know is there) by going through all the categories. All in all a great app, would recommend! edit to 5 - app now has a search function
replyContent: Hey there, thanks for the rave review! That search function really comes in handy, and users like you made that clear to us. Thanks for the feedback and for being a faithful Drop member! :)

content: It's not good, I mean I didn't even try to go farther than the link cards point. The app forces you to choose between 5 brands that I just use Starbucks and it's not even fair that they don't have more options. In the pictures of the app they show different brands as best buy or Amazon but it's a completely lie. Really bad app, hopefully in the future or would be better.

Used to be a great way to save a few bucks every couple of months. Used to be automatic. Now they've changed it to require almost all shopping to be done through the app and it's a horrible experience. This app "Drop"ped down from 5 stars and is now virtually worthless. I saved about $15 in the first 6-8 months. Since then, I haven't saved a dime. It's now uninstalled.

I can't redeem points that were earned with boosted points. Also, didn't receive pending points for well over 2 months now. Just shows they are pending. I contacted customer service, which was useless. They told me my account was being reviewed for suspicious activity. They closed the ticket with no explanation or reason why I cant redeem points. My points are only worth $20, does this look suspicious. Don't bother, not worth the hassle.

Drop is horrible now, I used to redeem my points right away now you have to shop thru the app to redeem your points, I used to get 10 dollars worth of gift cards from Amazon now it has to be 25 dollars. I don't want to shop thru drop there's nothing I'm interested in buying with the brand's. I have 33 dollars worth of points but I can't use them. I'm very disappointed. Why do people have to change something and make it horrible for users?
replyContent: Hey there, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. If you would like to send us a message, including this username or a reference to this review, at support@joindrop.com we would be happy to go over the policy change and your options. Thanks for being a Drop member :)

content: Decent app. Points come in slow but consistent for the regular supercharge purchases. However I signed up for Tangerine account which is supposed to reward 25,000 points 30 days after completion. My account has been open for almost 2 months and nothing has come through. I've also opened tickets regarding the missing points multiple times through the app but have not heard or seen any changes.  Edit:  Was contacted and the points were added.

Used to be a fantastic app, loved just collecting points for going about my day. However, I can no longer access the app. Every time i open it i get "network issues" error. My connection is fine, the problem seems to be with the app. Very disappointed and frustrated to have one of my favourite apps completely broken.

The service is a great idea and almost well executed. I had 2 vastly different experiences with their customer service - one good and one terrible. The app itself is horrible - extremely slow, extremely laggy and not optimized. Has 5 star potential if service was improved and app performance is increased by 10 - 50 times. This is the worst app performance of any app on my phone.

The app itself works great, no bugs, no issues. Points for Walmart, mcdonalds, Tim Hortons all show up within a couple of days. However, I signed up for Disney+ back at the end of March and have yet to receive my points for it. Ive made numerous purchases through clearly, Sephora and other shopping links and none of my points show up for those either. Customer service is pretty unless when you contact them about them about these issues.
replyContent: Hey Kate! Oh no, missing points sounds like something we should definitely look into for you! Could you please send us an email to support@joindrop.com? Please reference this review, that will help us make sure we have all the information to get started on investigating this. Hopefully, we can straighten everything out!

content: The customer service is atrocious. Takes days to respond, and they don't address the issue. I'm still waiting for points to be credited to my account after I completed an offer. They delay interactions by continuously suggesting that perhaps you haven't followed the steps, which is false and misleading. I seldom comment on things, but don't share your information with them.

I love the app, but I also have serious issues with it. I've had several offers which were "boosted" but never received the boosted points, just the normal points. Customer service is non-existant. You message them and they don't get back to you. Also, getting the points for completed game requirements is hit and miss. Some I've gotten a few days after completion, others it's been over 2 months and nothing. They REALLY need to fix customer service.
replyContent: Hey Charlene, I'm certain we can turn this 3-star review into a 5-star review. Could you please send us an email to support@joindrop.com? Please reference this review, that will help us make sure we have all the information to get started on investigating this. Hopefully, we can get this all resolved. Thanks!

content: They got terrible support process for resolving issues. If you need to exit the app, you have to press back two times. I don't know why. Its been an year never rexeived my referral reward points. And its been more than three months they keep on saying we are working in redeeming your reward amd will soon update you. I can't wait for that sooner any more now.
replyContent: Hey there, Thanks for letting us know! We encourage you to submit a support ticket in-app or alternatively send an email to support@earnwithdrop.com with the subject line "Play Store Help" and we would be more than happy to help! We look forward to hearing from you!

content: So disappointed in the changes in this app.. I used to give it 5 stars but now I only give it 1. Gift cards are much harder to obtain and you are forced to shop through the app to get lower valued gift cards to unlock....which sucks when you don't do a huge amount of online shopping. Also, since the change my linked card points are not being added... I have shopped numerous times in the the past two weeks and only have gotten points for two transactions. Don't waste your time!
replyContent: Hey Jason, thanks for your feedback on the app. We rely on feedback from members like you to help make this the best app it can be. For the missing points issue you mentioned we hope you'll reach out at support@joindrop.com so we can look into this for you! Hope you have a great day!

content: It was good. When it worked... Have had issues with my credit card several times months at a time. Then I'd have to manually tally my cards. It's now been unlinked for almost a year. No progress. Just that they're aware and working on it. I have hundreds if not thousands of points missing cuz of this
replyContent: Hey Jess, we understand card-linking issues can be frustrating. We are working with our providers to find a resolution with some of the banks that are having connectivity issues. Please send us a message if you need any support, support@joindrop.com.

content: This app is a great concept but has shaky execution. Sometimes it's great and you can get points towards gift cards easily. Other times you complete an offer only to never see the points promised. It's very hit or miss right now, which is a shame as I would otherwise recommend it to people. Also their drop spin game always crashes the app. Every time.
replyContent: Hey Jared, thanks so much for reporting this Drop Spin issue. It has since been fixed! I hope it's working for you now. If there is any way we could make it a 5-star experience (like adding missing points) we would love to hear about it at support@joindrop.com. Be sure to reference your review so we can keep track of your case! :)

content: Been using this app since 2017 and over the past year they've made changed that make the app frustrating to use. You used to be able to make points for simple everyday purchases, now you have to buy something through the app to get points. I wanted to cash out my years worth of points so I could delete the app but apparently any reward under 75,000 has to be "unlocked" by buying something through their app! Why should I have to spend money to unlock points I've had for years? Makes no sense.

Drop used to be great but you can no longer earn the way the app was originally intended. They took away my 5 stores and now you only earn through "flash deals" with a ridiculous minimum $ purchase or by buying things at places you don't shop at through their app. I do not recommend wasting your time, go to one of the other points apps that are still fair.

Used to enjoy the app immensely, recommended it to so many friends. I was okay with the trade off: giving the app person information and my spending habits on which the app would make a profit in exchange for a little gift card every now and then. Now to even try to redeem I have to have an ungodly amount of points and make a purchase in a store I either wouldn't shop at or have no interest shopping at at the time. Not worth it
replyContent: Hey there, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. If you would like to send us a message, including this username or a reference to this review, at support@joindrop.com we would be happy to go over the policy change and your options. Thanks for being a Drop member :)

content: Been trying to submit a request for missing points for one week but keep getting ignored regardless of the avenue I contact the "support" team. If you enjoy spending hours trying to receive points, and never getting them, and to continuously have the minimum number of points you need for rewards to increase, this is your app. Otherwise spend your time and energy elsewhere.

Used to be a big proponent of this app but the functionality has been far from satisfactory. Card constantly requires relinking (relink one day, get a notice to relink a couple days later. Rinse and repeat)which is frustating and tiresome. Also they mention they would reimburse the points earned from the relink interim period but these never seem to get added. Update: Now able to relink my card

I really like the concept of this app. I use it mainly in the background - ie. I'm not on the site searching for deals or shopping through the app - and its awesome to see the points add up while I'm not even doing anything. It would be great to see a feature added where you can change your power offers once every five years though, or maybe each user gets one free change and then you spend points to make a change.

Used drop religiously when it first came out. Then my card got discontinied with drop with no notice. It's hard to earn points quick enough to get anything, and now with the higher gift card limits and offer wall, it is even harder. Their support team is pretty quick and hands on though. If more offer of my style comes along I may get back into the swing of things, but since my card cannot be affiliated it's harder for me.
replyContent: Hey Adam, thanks for sharing your feedback. The good news is that card-linking is no longer required to enjoy the many benefits of receiving points and rewards with Drop! Please contact us at support@joindrop.com to learn more.

content: Drop was fantatsic when it was launched. However, lately i can't say the same. The points are not added as frequently and regulalry as before. The customer service is pathetic with response time varying from 2 to 3 weeks. Their integration with Plaid was news but flawed. I hope they improve their service, solve their tech issues and deliver on promises. Updated There has no response to my questions/queries since the last 3 months. I am missing on atleast 8000 points meanwhile.

The app started out great used it for awhile and everything worked no issues. Now whenever I make a purchase it doesn't show up even if its directly through the app. One of my purchases has been pending for a month. Not to mention any time I try to make a complaint it won't let me. Way to many issues for what it's worth.
replyContent: Hey Ajay, these definitely sound like issues our support team could solve for you fairly quickly to ensure that you get your points right away. Could you please send us a support ticket to support@earnwithdrop.com entitled "Google Play Store help" so we can get you back to earning rewards? Always happy to help! :)

content: Definitely used to be a good app. Used to be able earn points really fast. But I don't see I'm earning points from McDonald's, Walmart, Tim Hortons or Starbucks anymore. content: doesnt work with simplii anymore. used to work just fine until December then it stopped working. been chatting with their customer service off and om since late December to ultimately determine that they dont know why it wont work and they dont have a solution just to 'keep trying'. no use for it if it wont work with my main bank, even if its listed aa a supported bank.

Was a really fun app, but got rid of the $5 dollar and $10 rewards, I enjoyed being able to cash out early. Edit: This app is just terrible at this point, I don't even use a service anymore and can't change my power offers, and suddenly in April you guys reduce to 1 pt per $ and don't even notify us? Reading other reviews, and you guys just copy and paste your answer after, I use to really enjoy your app, been using it since 2018. Others should stay away since they now have ridiculous goals.

We'd love to help you earn even more points, please reach out to support at supprt@joindrop.com so we can give you some helpful tips. :)

content: You have to make an in app purchase to get to your points- under 30 000. The gift section for 30 dollar rewards is signifigantly limited. There are plenty of apps in this space, I would highly recommend that you avoid this one.
replyContent:
Hey there, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. We know it can be really frustrating when things change in the app. For a little more context on this we made an FAQ series that you can check out here: https://support.joindrop.com/hc/en-us/categories/202567547-FAQ

content: Personally very frustrated with the lack of customer support. Many instances of missing points. I have received an amazon gift card in the past that did work, so I'm not questioning the apps legitimacy. But they changed their reward system and made it much harder to cash a card out. I'm really dissapointed in the chamges, half of the rewards just disapeared, and the rest that are left really aren't exciting enough to keep using the app.

replyContent: Hey Sophia! So glad to hear that you had a great experience with our support team. We're always here if you need us :)

content: Originally when this app was in its infancy you would be able to collect and redeem points almost weekly for tiny 5000 point rewards that made the app almost thrilling to own. replyContent: Hey Carolyn, thanks for your feedback. I’m sorry to hear you are not having a good experience with us. For more information on the changes, I encourage you to check our FAQ page at joindrop.com. Hope you have a great day! :)

content: App is ridiculously bad. content: Horrible app. The closer you get to redeeming a gift card, the harder it gets and the more they take them away. I did a shop through the app to earn points and wasn't credited. Easy to use points. Customer service is quick & thorough & is actually TRUE customer service ( Luke you da bomb) which is rare these days as we all know. content: I like Drop, but there's no optional offers. I enjoy going to certain places and getting points off an order or a shopping place. However there Needs to be More options!! content: I've had a bad experience through this app. I purchased a speaker using one of the affiliate links however have not seen the points reflected on my account. No where on the page did it indicate this time out happened or was there any warning that this could happen. This experience has definitely left a bad impression of this app.

Re-reviewing this app. And as all the other feedback suggests, this app is just a scam. The more points you accumulate, the more reward cards they remove from redemption. Was saving for an Amazon gift card and as soon as I hit my goal, they remove it from redemption. There are considerably better and more honest rewards programs out there to use. Drop has lost me and my shopping data for good.
replyContent: Hey Patrick, thanks for your feedback. I’m sorry to hear you are not having a good experience with us. For more information on the changes I encourage you to check our FAQ (https://support.joindrop.com/hc/en-us/). Hope you have a great day!

content: Changing my rating from 5 stars to 1 star, this used to be a great app for collecting points and redeeming gift cards, i almost had enough for a $10 amazon card, but then they changed it to $20 amazon then i was only halfway to redeeming it. Then after i got a couple more $ worth of points they change it again amd completely take out the amazon card from redeeming using points, now you have to "buy within drop" to redeem anything under $30. Super not impressed with the new update.

I'm extremely disappointed with how this app changed. Before I could redeem at 5k points, then it was limited to 10k, followed by 15k, 20k, and 25k. I only checked recently as there was notification about uber eats (my birthday is this saturday so we're ordering sushi). 75K to redeem now?! That's absurd! Drop has really deteriorated since it started.

content: the concept is great, however the customer service is severely lacking. I am basically always told it's my fault when i have missing points, even after using the direct links provided through the app or emailing myself a desktop link. Only get the points I should be awarded about 30% of the time. Waiting to cash in my 50000 points and then i will probably stop using this app. I also think it's unfair that long time members can't change their ongoing offers, (the offers that can gain points just by using the linked card and not having to use a link or anything) because there are far more that are applicable to me now that more companies use drop.
replyContent: Hey there, this doesn't sound like us! If you're still missing points could you please send us a support ticket to support@earnwithdrop.com entitled "Google Play Store help"? We can also help you change your ongoing offers. :) Thanks, and looking forward to hearing from you!

content: Upon opening this app, I instantly realized this app is unbelievably slow. In addition, almost all of the offers require me to shop using their link to earn points. So what was the point of forcing me to link a credit card in the first place if a purchase link is necessary? I attempted to unlink my card, but it wouldn't allow me. It says it needs me to verify my account with my phone number to keep my account secure. Really? To keep my account secure? I have to give you my phone number just to unlink my credit card? I am beyond disappointed and I will not use this app again. This is my first time writing an app review, and I really hope others don't have to go through what I went through.
replyContent: Hi Michael, our engineers just rolled out a fix which addresses app performance, slowness, and lag. Please update your Drop app to the latest version and reach out to support@joindrop.com if these issues persist. We do ask members to confirm their phone number for security purposes and we'd be happy to help you out with this if you reach out to us.

content: Jan 13, 19: did NOT honor Sep, 18 100 points per $1 spent at eBay promotion after almost 4 months. It was a $300 purchase, so the reward points would be about $30. I have contacted Drop many times already and the issue is still pending. I believe Drop has no intention to resolve the issue judging from the response I got.

Drop is very useful. U simply just use your card and u gain points without even knowing. You can also go out of your way to spend and get rewarded. For example, you got 15,000 (equivalent to $15) points for spending $50 at staples. So I did my back to school shopping there when I very easily could have done it somewhere else and got nothing in return. You can also do surveys nd suggest the app friends to get rewards. $5 for every person you bring to the app.

Card keeps unlinking and doesn't relink 90% of the time. My online banking keeps locking me out because of "suspicious login attempts" ever since I got this app. I've had to goto my branch twice now to unlock my online banking. Typing your online banking credentials into an app doesn't seem very smart to me.. Major security risk. Uninstalling, definitely not worth it. Think about it people! You're inputting your login credentials into an app.. U should never be giving these details out!

Made a purchase via the app. Did not give me the points. Contacted support, they gave me a list of reasons that there would be no points for the purchase and none of them applied. First time ever using the app to purchase something, and will definately be the last. This app is now absolutle rubbish.
replyContent: Hey Peter, thanks for sharing your feedback. Sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with us. In some cases our partners or affiliates reject points based on the terms and conditions outlined. In 2019 alone, almost 11.7 billion points were earned by our members. We will always give points to our members when they meet the offer requirements..

content: Reallt upset with the fact that you can no longer get small giftcards. Now it has to be a minimum of $25 and you have to make a purchace to even unlock that. So the real minimum is $30. Now going on dates is even harder. So thanks. It was a good app. It needa to go back.
replyContent: Hey Rebecca, thanks for your feedback. I’m sorry to hear you are not having a good experience with us. For more information on the changes I encourage you to check our FAQ (https://support.joindrop.com/hc/en-us/). Hope you have a great day!

content: They do not actually give you promised points very often. Their customer service is completely useless. Several months ago, it started crashing every time I used it and now I can't use it at all as it either crashes on startup or shortly after startup. The support from Drop has been mediocre at best and they are unable to solve my issues after months of unhelpful emails and redundant advice. Do not get this app; it is not worth the frustration.
replyContent: Hi there! We'd love to look into this with you so that we can find out together what we need to do to get you back on track! Please email support@earnwithdrop.com, so that we can investigate this together!

content: Was looking forward to using this app after a known youtuber recommended it. First issue, this app should be voice over friendly for ease of accessibility, you need someone else to help guide you through it without this. Second issue, when asked to enter my card number, it took me to my banking login screen. I am NOT okay with that nor am I taking that chance. I dont care how secure an app claims to be, not going to happen. Third issue, being forced to pick 5 companies and not having the ability to go back and change them later on. This discouraged me at the get go. In the end, I think the idea of this app is great and has potential but it's going to need a lot more work to get there. Good luck team, dont give up, this app has the ability to be amazing!

This app sucks. The card linking feature doesn't ever stay linked and you have to wait months before seeing the points show up if they even show up at all. I deleted it months ago, bit decided to retry because they said they fixed the linking issue. They did not. Also you used to be able to redeem points for 5/10/25 dollar gift cards, now they start at $75!!! It would take forever to earn that many points, so redemption is not attainable anymore. Do not waste your time!
replyContent: Hey Jacquelyn, thanks for your feedback. We'd be happy to guide you on how to earn enough points to get to your next reward. We have plenty of boosted offers, games, contests, surveys, offers over 25,000 points, and more. Please reach us at support@joindrop.com if you have any questions, and be sure to reference this review to help us keep track.

content: My sister loves this app and talks highly of it so I decided to get it, too. Unfortunately, when we were comparing our apps, she has five power offer stores and when I signed up, I was only allowed two. I think the concept is great, except, how is someone supposed to rack up points if we don't have more power offer options? I don't do much online shopping which means I swipe my card in stores more frequently, which means I won't be able to get points even if I shopped a lot.
replyContent: Hey Nou, this great feedback and we'll be sure to share this with the broader team. The Drop app has gone through many improvements over its lifetime & since your sister joined Drop, we grandfathered some Power offers and now offer the choice of 2. We'd love to chat more in detail about this and if you're interested, please submit an in-app ticket!

content: 12/19 Update : Used it for a year now. First few months were great till things changed. I mainly redeem Starbucks and like dominoes gift cards. And they raised the goal from $5 to $20-$30 to meet before you're able to redeem anything and on top of that. For items that have lots of points. It takes about 2-3 months to get. They make excuses as to why they haven't given your points. They also added so many steps to redeem a gift card. It's not worth the headache really. I'm going to delete soon!
replyContent: Hey there, we’re sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. We know it can be really frustrating when things change. Gift cards between $5-$25, including Starbucks, are available if you’ve shopped through Drop in the last 12 months. Shopping via our app is what makes Drop possible. It's how we reward you for shopping at brands you love.

content: I wasn't able to use the app I made an account perfectly fine but trying to go through everything nothing would load or let me press anything

I thought at first I wasn't getting points for shopping at my two power offer stores by error. Upon further research, it turns out they did away with this feature completely?!? Now you have to leave push notifications on or search for offers you don't want which is super annoying. They suckered me into collecting my data for a few months then changed how the game works. I don't trust this app and don't recommend anyone else try it either.
replyContent:
Hey Aaron, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. We know it can be really frustrating when things change in the app. For a little more context on this, we made an FAQ series that you can check out here: https://support.joindrop.com/hc/en-us/categories/202567547-FAQ
Hope you have a great day!

content: Very Slow App!

I like the concept but their execution of it is horrible. If you are lucky enough to be able to sign up and link your cards give it some time and they will have problems and you will get "We are currenly experiencing delays with this institution. Please visit our support page." There is no useful information on the support page and if you contact support you will never hear back. This has been going on for months with multuple institutions. I wrote support months ago and have not heard back.

I used to love this app, but they decided to change the redemption process. So if I want to redeem points for a gift card under 30 dollars, I have to now "unlock" those options by shopping through the app and making a purchase on a website. That's crazy, honestly it's ridiculous. I hate this. Why can't I just get my giftcard? I mean I earned it. It's ridiculous. I am so mad.

Was great for the first few weeks then doesn't work out of nowhere. Customer support is nonexistent. Every request for my points is met with the same generic answer. Either they need to fix this or get off the Google play store. This is ridiculous. (update) app is fixed but all questions for points lost due to their poor system is met with silence now. worthless.
replyContent: Hi Joshua, so sorry we missed your ticket! I've responded to it just now. Unfortunately it looks like your institution is no longer supported by our service provider. Sorry about that, there's a bit more information in my ticket response. Thanks for being a Drop member!

content: To follow up the customer service: I booked the flight on May 31st, 2019. Yet, no support still. It already has passed 60 days. Thanks but no thanks. I still havent receive a follow up email per my request for my points.  Thanks for the quick reply but that was absolutely unhelpful. I will keep on opening tickets until somebody in customer service start to care.
replyContent: Hey Jason, we're sorry our team hasn't had a chance to connect with you yet. Points from eligible flight bookings can take up to 60 days to post to your Drop account once you've attended your flight. This ensures that if there are any additional charges to this booking, you earn points for this too! We hope this was helpful!

content: This app is ok. I like that I don't have to think about shopping through the app and still get points for my Power Offers. However, I wish I could change my Power Offers every so often. Editing from 3 to 2 stars after I read you have to make a purchase in app to redeem points. No thanks... hopefully they change this. Another update: still 2 stars. Now my power offers are 1 point per dollar (was 5 pts) and still can't change them. Doesn't seem like they're actually working on any improvements.
replyContent: Hey Molly, thanks for sharing your feedback, and sorry to hear that you're disappointed with these changes. Please reach us at support@joindrop.com (and be sure to reference your review) and we can go over the many ways that you can easily earn points towards your next reward. Thanks, and we hope to hear from you!

content: When I first got the app you could redeem rewards for as low as $5 gift cards. I once had a large purchase I made not show up so I never got the points for it and it's hard to get a hold of someone for help, they mostly just send back automated responses apologizing but not necessarily fixing it. Now you need a lot more points to redeem a reward unless you want to do several additional steps that seem like it limits your options. Will be deleting app, not worth it.
replyContent: Thanks so much for taking the time to write a review. we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. We’re working hard to make this the best app it can be, and we couldn’t do it without the feedback from members like you. Hope you have a great day!

content: It takes a long time to open and use.

sounded good but I've been having major problems with this app. First one of my two offers wouldn't process because of a problem with the retailer. then the card I had on file was causing a problem so none of the points would come through from my purchases. Now I can't even get the app to stay open to shop through. Support has been friendly but None of these problems have been resolved to date, and i have to store all my receipts to check if and when they process
replyContent: Hey Jackie! We know it’s frustrating when things don’t work as they should. The good news is that card-linking is no longer required to enjoy the many benefits of receiving points and rewards with Drop! Happy to try to troubleshoot any issues and go over tips on how to best earn points! Please contact us at support@joindrop.com to learn more.

content: This used to be an excellent app. Now they recently dropped the amount of points you earn per dollar on almost all offers. They also increased the amount of points needed to redeem, so the smallest amount is 25,000 and anything good is 50,000. Used to be able to redeem good things for only 10,000. These changes are clearly meant to limit your rewards, which is the whole point of the app. It will take a year to earn anything. Not worth it anymore.
replyContent: Hey there, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. We are working hard on new features that will provide you with more opportunities to earn points and customize your Drop experience. If you have any other questions please don’t hesitate to let us know at support@joindrop.com. Thanks for being a Drop member :)

content: Do not use. They offer a promotion. You complete it and then they take your points back after you have already spent the money to complete the promotion and tell you there is a "technical glitch" and points should not have been awarded. I have screenshots I've the terms and conditions and me completing the promotion. DO NOT USE. They will probably remove this review as well. The team was in touch to tell me that I didn't complete the offer, which I did. This app is a scam. UPDATE: Drop has literally lied in an email now to me saying that the "offer has been activated since 12/26" but I haven't completed. It still shows I have spent $0 so this is obviously a lie. EXTREMELY DECEPTIVE BUSINESS PRACTICE.
replyContent: Hey Brad, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. Our team has been in touch to go over the details and resolve any misunderstandings. Have a great day and thanks for being a Drop member.

content: This used to be the best rewards app and I have gotten many gift cards in the past for Target and Starbucks. BUT that was when $5 & $10 gift card amounts were available. I've been saving up for a $20 Amazon gift card and am very close (a little over 17,000 points) and noticed on the app today that the lowest gift card amount is now $25. So not only have they significantly reduced the available gift card options but they have also increased the amount to redeem. #bringtheolddropback
replyContent: Hey there, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. Thanks for being a Drop member :)

content: Like others have said, this app used to be great. Not sure when it changed, but now you have to purchase something through the app to unlock any rewards under $25. Most of the special rewards are for specialty stores, or for subscription boxes. If you're like me and you just get the points for grocery shopping, gas, and everyday things- I don't earn any extra points besides the regular ones because I don't shop much outside of that. It's quickly become useless for me to have my info stored here.

content: App used to be much more useful. Rewards ranged from 5 dollars all the way up to 100. I've been spending and earning for months, saving up for a 20 dollar gift card. I log in today to check on the status of an offer I completed (which after three weeks still hasn't been added) only to find now they only offer 25 dollar and up gift cards. And, naturally, the card that I was saving for that used to be available at 20 dollars is now only available at 50.
replyContent: Hey Christine, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. content: This app is nothing like Ebates do not link your card because once you link your card it makes it very difficult to unlink your card. I also reached out to their customer service to see if I can get assistance for points that were not showing up on my account and did not receive a response. Instead, I received a response email asking to rate the service that I never received - good or bad. I'm actually really done with this app and would like to unlink my card before I uninstall and forget all about this app. However, before I do I wanted to warn anyone who is at all interested in the app please do not download and if you do do not link your bank accounts. Sorry to all the people I actually tried to refer to this app. I truly am.

I really liked this app until I changed my password on my online bank, now I cannot relink with my new password, even when I completely unlinked it. ughhhhhh please fix this because it just keep saying, "Please try connecting a different account. replyContent: Hey Lori, sounds like a case for our support team! We'd love to help guide you through to a resolution, could you please send us a support ticket to support@earnwithdrop.com entitled "Google Play Store help" so we can get you back to earning rewards? Thanks! :)

content: My friend referred me and I was excited that for cashback on in-store purchases. She was allowed to pick as many stores as she wanted when she signed up. Apparently they've changed this and I was only able to select 2. It was not made clear when I was selecting that I would be locked into those 2 stores forever, there is seemingly no way to change them. I also agree with the comment on the FAQ, I think it is bs that you limit people to 2 because that's all people use. Way to eff people over.

content: The app improved over the last few months.

Was about to redeem a $10 reward when all of the sudden, $25 is the minimum! Another user referenced needing to do a deal to be eligible for under $25 redemptions, but I've done 2 deals and it's across the board that they've changed their policy. Incredibly underwhelmed. Previously had a great customer service experience when the snake game didn't work, so I gave them 2 stars instead of 1.
replyContent: Hey Mercer, thanks for your feedback. I’m sorry to hear you are not having a good experience with us. For more information on the changes I encourage you to check our FAQ (https://support.joindrop.com/hc/en-us/). Hope you have a great day!

content: Sounds like a good concept, problem is, it never loads. It just sits on the intro screen that says "drop" and has the little green thing spinning underneath. I can let it sit for 5-10 minutes and it still never will load anything, just stays on that screen. Given the other reviews ive read on here, i dont have high hopes for this app. Apparently its VERY buggy. Deleting now because its a waste of storage on my phone at this point.

It used to be amazing until they made the change to the rewards. I miss my $10 Amazon cards, but since the change if the reward is less than $20 you have to shop through the app instead of just using your linked card. I guess I'll just keep racking up points and maybe one day they will put another GC that is useful to me (personally)

Used to be good. I earned a few $10 Amazon gift card. Maybe one ever 3 months or so. Then I started not getting credited points for purchases pretty often. Then they raised the Amazon gift card to $20, which I have never earned enough for. Now you have to have $30 in points to redeem anything. This may literally take years to gets a gift card. I can no longer recommend the app. At this point I'm kind of wondering if I'll ever get a gift card again. Maybe that's the point of what they are doing.

Would've gave 5 stars if it wasnt for the fact that they removed the under $30 gift card redeem options. The fact that you have to purchase through the app to open up those options is ridiculous. This is supposed to be an app that essentially gives money back to the user for spending money at the businesses partnered with it so, why should I have to go spend more of my money to unlock, of all things, the cheapest reward options.

I did have an issue with an offer not tracking properly. I was able to email the support staff and (Luke) was able to resolve my issue and provide me with my points almost instantly after I provided the requested information to him. The app did have some issues where I was not able to contact support inside the app. However, via their email it worked out. It is nice to check the Drop app to see if there are any offers out there worth doing, as well as how everyday spending can earn points.
replyContent:
Hey there! So glad to hear that you had a great experience with our support team. We're always here if you need us :)
Hope you have a great day!

content: This app was so much better when I first began using it in 2018. Now, it's almost worthless. Back then, I was able to get a couple gift cards that really helped me out when I needed it (a Domino's gift card when I needed food). Now, you need at least 25k points, points which take longer to get since they changed everything. I feel like this was a more long and drawn out "bait and switch" in that they lured us in with a great app in the beginning, only to switch up on us later. Disappointed.

Please reach out to us at support@joindrop.com for tips on earning with Drop!

content: I cannot sign into the app anymore and customer support is non-existent. They reply 2 weeks after you put in the request and tell you to reinstall or update the app, then ignore you for a few weeks and reply with the same advice again. Seemed like it could be a cool app when I first installed it, much like the far superior Dosh app, but unfortunately I can't even access my account anymore.

Earning with Drop is simple enough, and sometimes you can earn $5/10 at once just by buying something you were already going to buy. But the redemption options and amounts constantly change without warning, and the minimum to cash out has gone up to $25/$50/$100 now, which is WORSE than most other apps. On top of it all, the interface is HORRIFICALLY SLOW. I would try to email the developer and ask why, but there's no contact info. It's unusably bad now - but it wasn't always this way.
replyContent: Thanks so much for reaching out. We’re working hard to make this the best app it can be, and we couldn’t do it without the feedback from members like you. We would love to hear more at support@joindrop.com if you have time to go into more details!

content: Used to love this app however I've opened a ticket multiple times because none of my purchases to my selected vendors showing up. Nothing since July 13th. It's okay, but can be frustrating. It's easy enough to link cards and it's really nice that it keeps track for you (no scanning receipts). Sometimes cards get unlinked or it doesn't catch everything. But the biggest drawback is that you only get points from certain brands and stores. And, in my experience, the available list to pick from wasn't useful. I don't get many points because my power offer stores (which you CANNOT change) aren't ones I often use. I'm sure they do that on purpose.

content: They took away $10 rewards so now you have to earn atleast $25 to cash out. And you'll be lucky if you get anything back from your purchases. content: Really useless. The app crashed and glitched constantly. You can't do anything past 5 clicks. Every time I open this app, something else isn't working. Also, most of the relevant stores and apps I shop with you have to be a new member to redeem points so it's useless to me. it also takes up to 2 months to get your points reflected on your account so they can make sure you're not scamming them which also makes this app useless.

They made it harder to earn any rewards. They took away good rewards and made offers more difficult. They don't take the banks they have offers for so wasted time on that. The banks they do take have connection issues, they can't fix because they keep saying it's not them. It's multiple banks and it's been 2 years now. Customer support doesn't like whenever you ask for any help that's why they cut off opening a ticket easily. They designed a chat bot that will not let you open a ticket at all!

I love the Drop app. Its easy to use and easy to redeem your reward points. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because every time I complete an offer worth more than a couple hundred points, my points have not been applied and Ive had to email Drop to get the points added. Last time this hapoened, my 15,000 points were added plus an extra 1,000 for inconvenience. Thankful but wish it would work correctly in the first place. Great app but weird the high point offers never seem to work.

I've used this app since 2018 and had no issues until now. My card unlinked itself and I tried to relink it but it says my bank no longer exists? Like what? There's no number to call or email to ask how I can relink it. I gave $15 in the app and can't even use it because there's no gift cards for less than $25. content: Deleted right after downloaded. - To link a debit or credit card, you have to authorize your credit card company/ bank to send data to a third part that then forwards the data to Drop. And your data is eligible for continuous transfers until you decide to remove the linked card. - I would feel more comfortable linking my PayPal acct but that was not an option. - Also, after reading other reviews, I'll pass on this app.
replyContent: Hey Kelsey, your security is top priority for our team. Our team has implemented high-level encryption so that nobody, not even you, can move funds in or out of your account when using Drop. With Plaid, we've anonymized your data and never store it in our systems to make sure that your information remains protected and secured. Hope this helps! :)

content: The verification codes to sign up didn't come through, so it was really hard to sign up. Then, there were hardly any stores to choose from. replyContent:

content: Drop isn't as great as it used to be for earning rewards (It used to be possible to earn a $25 Amazon giftcard... now they only come in $50 increments and it feels unattainable.) Don't waste your time. I'm missing 2,000+ points from my account. The offer is loaded and my card is registered. I reached out to customer service about each transaction and no response. I reached out to a different support and they said I had to provide all the receipts. I did that and I'm still waiting for a response. These transactions were over a month ago! And now you can only redeem rewards for $30+ unless you shop through the app. Should've redeemed but was waiting for my points to show up

I'm with everyone else that this app used to be awesome and would've been a 5-star app. You could earn a lot and passively, which was great. But after doing away with the power offers, it's really quite useless. They try to justify this change with some empty rhetoric, but my guess is that it really about profitability. I wish they'd be more transparent to users. I'd give it's current features 2 stars, but 3 stars if I include its past glory.
replyContent: Hi Kenley, thanks for your feedback! With Flash Deals, members can earn points on many offers instead of being limited to 2 or 5 as they were with Power Offers. We recognize that members' spending habits change, so we listened to the feedback we'd been given. For more tips on how to earn lots of points, please visit our FAQ page at joindrop.com.

content: I have been with drop since the beta days. I chose Costco when I signed up but was given Starbucks instead, asked to have it changed but never received a response. Also, I was never compensated for reconnecting my cards and some connected cards have never registered purchases. Please help. Thanks.
replyContent: Hey there, we’re really sorry to hear you’re having a bad experience with us. If you would like to send us a message at support@joindrop.com we would love to hear more about this!

content: Was good until recently. Without warning they changed the parameters of the app. You used to be able to have a card linked and for places like walmart, etc where you shop regularly. I finally inquired about why purchase points weren't showing anymore and got excuse they changed to power "challenges" needing you to check the app all the damn time instead because "people stopped using power point stores" um... who stops shopping at walmart?no one! Was great, now this app sucks!
replyContent: Hey Kara, we've just rolled out challenges and hope that you'll come to love them. You can read more about why we made this change here: https://support.joindrop.com/hc/en-us/articles/360044222353-Why-were-Power-offers-replaced- We also have tips on how to earn points, if you'd like to reach out to us at support@joindrop.com.

content: You use to could see how far away you were from earning a gift card, but now you have to shop through the app to be able to unlock the option.
